data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 22036, Version Hash: 305e872586fccb6738305bf6569725267600ea01
data.actual_result: The Test Video goes transparent and is animated down/grow larger. It is however still clickable at the div level
data.expected_result: The video settings preview panel is clear or interactive items after starting the test
data.short_description: In User Settings, the "Test Video" button is still showing as clickable after pressing it
data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings and go to > Voice and Video - Scroll down to Video Settings - (opt) Select a Camera - Click Test Video and keep your cursor at this position - Move your cursor down
